      • standardSetup

        public void standardSetup()
                   throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Object based version of standardSetup()
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If the client refuses or server can't supply an encoding

      • standardSetup

        public static void standardSetup(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Sets the "domain", "recaptcha_key", and "theme" attributes. Sets the Character Encoding to UTF-8
        Parameters:
        request - The request which requires a standard set up.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Shouldn't happen. Occurs if the server or client can't use UTF-8. Although that's extremely rare.

      • setFontWeight

        private static void setFontWeight(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        public static void setFontSize(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      • userIsMod

        public static boolean userIsMod(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Determines if the user that made a request is a moderator. Checks the AuthTable for the Tomcat session ID cookie's status.
        Parameters:
        request - The request from the user.
        Returns:
        true if the user is a moderator, false otherwise.

      • userIsAuth

        public static boolean userIsAuth(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Determines if the user that made a request is an authorized user believed to be human. Checks the AuthTable for the Tomcat session ID cookie's status.
        Parameters:
        request - The request from the user.
        Returns:
        true if the user is authorized, false otherwise.

      • setTheme

        public static void setTheme(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Adds a "theme" attribute to the request. This is used to chose a style sheet in a .jsp file.
        Parameters:
        request - The request which needs a theme to be applied.

      • rejectGetMethod

        public static void rejectGetMethod(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Used to prevent get methods on endpoints meant for submitting content
        Parameters:
        response - Response to use for the error
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Something went wrong with http

      • hasParameters

        public static boolean hasParameters(java.lang.String[] parameters,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Checks to see if the given parameters are not null and not empty
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters from the client, often represented in the URL
        request - The request the parameters are in
        response - Gives a 400 error
        Returns:
        true if the parameters are usable, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Something went wrong with http

      • hasParameter

        public static boolean hasParameter(java.lang.String parameter,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Checks to see if the given parameter is not null and not empty
        Parameters:
        parameter - The parameter from the client, often represented in the URL
        request - The request the parameter is in
        Returns:
        true if the parameter is usable, false otherwise
